mapper.select: select DISTINCT b.FLOORCODE,b.FLOORNAME,b.FLOORID FROM gs_room a,gs_floor b where a.FLOORCODE=b.FLOORCODE AND b.FLOORNAME !='业主自用房' ORDER BY b.FLOORID
select b.roomno ,a.startdate from gs_quickbooking a , gs_quickbooking_roomno b where b.bookid=a.id and a.startdate > date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') and a.bookingflag='明确预定'

select floorid from gs_floor

select a.BUILDINGNAME buildingcode,b.FLOORNAME floorcode,c.TYPENAME roomtype,d.id,d.roomno,d.cname from gs_building a,gs_floor b,GS_ROOMTYPE c,gs_room d where a.BUILDID=d.BUILDINGCODE and b.FLOORID=d.FLOORCODE and c.typeId=d.ROOMTYPE and d.id=#{_parameter}

select floorid floorId,floorName FROM gs_floor

SELECT * FROM (select id,roomNo,doorlockId,remark,flag,sFlag from gs_room where floorcode=#{floorcode} AND floorcode!='202' ) x LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.guestName,a.startDate,a.endDate,b.roomId FROM gs_quickbooking a,gs_quickbooking_roomno b WHERE a.id = b.bookid AND unix_timestamp(NOW()) < unix_timestamp(a.enddate) AND unix_timestamp(NOW()) > unix_timestamp(a.startdate)) y ON x.id = y.roomid
SELECT * from gs_roomtype

SELECT * FROM (select id,roomNo,doorlockId,remark,flag,sFlag from gs_room where roomtype=#{roomType} AND floorcode!='202' ) x LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.guestName,a.startDate,a.endDate,b.roomId FROM gs_quickbooking a,gs_quickbooking_roomno b WHERE a.id = b.bookid AND unix_timestamp(NOW()) < unix_timestamp(a.enddate) AND unix_timestamp(NOW()) > unix_timestamp(a.startdate)) y ON x.id = y.roomid

SELECT * FROM (select id,roomNo,doorlockId,remark,flag,sFlag from gs_room where floorcode!='202' ) x LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.guestName,a.startDate,a.endDate,b.roomId FROM gs_quickbooking a,gs_quickbooking_roomno b WHERE a.id = b.bookid AND unix_timestamp(NOW()) < unix_timestamp(a.enddate) and a.guestName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{0}), '%') OR a.bookingNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{0}), '%') OR a.remark LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{0}), '%') ) y ON x.id = y.roomid

select a.ID,a.typeId,a.ROOMTYPE,a.TYPENAME, case when b.price is null then a.HOUSEPRICES else b.price end HOUSEPRICES,a.roomSum from ( SELECT a.ID,a.typeId,a.ROOMTYPE,a.TYPENAME,a.HOUSEPRICES,sum( case when b.FLAG='空房' then 1 else 0 end ) roomSum FROM gs_roomtype a,gs_room b where a.typeid=b.ROOMTYPE GROUP BY a.typeid) a left join REALTIMEHOUSEPRICE b on a.typeid=b.typeid and b.time=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
